sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { getProductsOfCategory } from '../../store/CatgoriesSlice' import style from './CategoryDetails.module.scss' export default function CategoryDetails() { const {products} = useSelector(state=>state.categories) let dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { dispatch(getProductsOfCategory()) }, [dispatch]) return (
{products.map((item)=>
(e.currentTarget.src = item.images[1])} onMouseOut={(e) => (e.currentTarget.src = item.images[0])} />

{item.title}

getData(item)} data-bs-toggle="modal" data-bs-target="#staticBackdrop" >
)}
) }
